WakeLockRequest.summary: The request() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fullfills with a object if the system screen wake lock is granted.

remarks.para: The screen wake lock prevents device screens from dimming or locking when an application needs to keep running.
-Stay awake with the Screen Wake Lock API

WakeLockRequest.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with a object.
